item.title: A Heartbreaking kind of love.
item.description:
A Heartbreaking kind of love.

Have you ever loved someone to the point that the very thought of them could break your heart? Figuratively speaking of course, but seriously ... have you ever allowed yourself to l‚ù§ve another that thinking of them, like to REALLY think of them, could make you crumble to the floor and weep over all of their glory?
